card.name: Mist Rias, Sonic Guardian
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Aqua Surfer
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Tajimal, Vizier of Aqua
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Multi ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ While battling a fire creature, this creature gets +4000 power.

card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have "blocker" from your hand to the battle zone.

card.name: The Strong Spiral
card.text: ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone, and return it to its owner's hand. ■ If you have a creature in the battle zone that has power 6000 or more, you may draw a card.

card.name: Lord Reis, Wisdom Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever you put a creature that has "Blocker" into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

card.name: Deepsea Dober
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Your creatures that have Command in their race each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

card.name: Counterattacking Silent Spark
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of the following. :► Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. :► Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Hatchaki
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution creature that has "blocker" that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Yuppal, Binding Guardian
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. It doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.
